ISSUE.TITLE: `now` not working on Wercker (CI)
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I was trying to set up `now` with my CI ([Wercker](http://www.wercker.com)) but I'm getting this error. `Error! Unexpected error. Please try later. (Authentication error â€“ stdin lacks setRawMode support)` I'm suspecting it tries to set up some kind of prompt, but I'm supplying my token with `--token` so I'm not sure where it would need a prompt for. Is this a bug or are some CI just not supported?

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: [now-next] Route 404 to custom Next.js error page (#569)
